code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Idle: Component Mounted

    Idle --> OperationStarted: User Action
    OperationStarted --> Processing: Service Call

    Processing --> Success: Operation Succeeds
    Processing --> RecoverableError: Recoverable Failure
    Processing --> CriticalError: Critical Failure

    Success --> Idle: Update UI

    RecoverableError --> ShowingError: Display Error
    ShowingError --> WaitingUserAction: Show Toast + Retry

    WaitingUserAction --> Retrying: User Clicks Retry
    WaitingUserAction --> ErrorDismissed: User Dismisses
    WaitingUserAction --> ErrorDismissed: Auto-dismiss Timeout

    Retrying --> Processing: Retry Service Call
    ErrorDismissed --> Idle: Clear Error State

    CriticalError --> ErrorBoundaryActive: Boundary Catches
    ErrorBoundaryActive --> ShowingFallback: Display Fallback UI
    ShowingFallback --> Recovering: User Clicks Recover
    ShowingFallback --> [*]: User Reloads Page

    Recovering --> Idle: Reset Component State

    note right of RecoverableError
        Connection timeouts
        Network errors
        Validation failures
        Publish failures
    end note

    note right of CriticalError
        Unhandled exceptions
        Component crashes
        Fatal service errors
    end note

    note right of ShowingError
        Error Classification:
        - Severity level
        - Error code
        - Troubleshooting hints
        - Retry capability
    end note
